about_the_game:
In a dystopian future marked by extreme weather and destroyed by human wars, a group of scientists embark on an expedition to revitalize a deserted area. After installing measuring instruments, a terrible disaster occurs and the team disappears. A few years later, another team is sent to the same location to recover the instruments and uncover clues about the previous team.

It is during this mission that Cytra, an young scientist, seeks the answers she needs while dreaming of a future with a new green world.


The world as we once knew no longer exists; an unwary person might think we're on Mars or another desolated planet. A significant portion of what remains of humanity now resides in isolated autonomous cities and frequently sends expeditions to attempt to restore habitability to devastated regions.


Survive the extreme weather or use it to your advantage. Weather conditions have unique effects on the environment and are closely related to survival mechanics.


Green Memories is an action RPG with sandbox and shooter elements, featuring beautiful pixel art and chiptune soundtrack inspired by other retro games.
